page.title: 08CROMER ROAD INDUSTRY
page.content: If you go from Antingham to North Walsham on the A149 the first thing you see is a larges works on the left. This is Crane Fruehauf,avery big company that makes lorry trailers and vans.My dad is Works Superintendent.the company is owned by an American.The site is28acres and they make 7-8 trailers per day and could make 14 if needed.the company first came to North Walsham in 1962. Next to Cranes is Marricks wire ropes. Marricks wire ropes make brake lifting cables,wire oarring cables.We found out that they make wire rope assemblies for crane Freuhauf.Marricks wire ropes have been on the Cromer road for 12years. There is a structural engineers near here in Aylsham Road-Wall Engineering.
